org.cyclops.integratedterminals.client.gui.container.component

Class GuiCraftingPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.AbstractGui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.Widget
        • org.cyclops.integratedterminals.client.gui.container.component.GuiCraftingPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.IGuiEventListener, net.minecraft.client.gui.IRenderable

    public class GuiCraftingPlan
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.Widget
    A gui component for visualizing CraftingOptionGuiData. The using gui must call the following methods from its respective method: * render(MatrixStack, int, int, float)} * drawGuiContainerBackgroundLayer(MatrixStack, float, int, int) * drawGuiContainerForegroundLayer(MatrixStack, int, int) * mouseScrolled(double, double, double)} * mouseDragged(double, double, int, double, double)}
